element.name: TEST_MODULE
element.documentation: Instructs the JUnit cartridge to process the package.

element.name: TEST_PROCESS
element.documentation: Instructs the JUnit cartridge to process the contents of this use-case.

element.name: IGNORE
element.documentation: Specifies if a test must be ignored.

element.name: PASSWORD
element.documentation: Specifies the password of the service's user.

element.name: SERVICE_NAME
element.documentation: Specifies the service's name related to the test case.

element.name: SERVICE_PACKAGE
element.documentation: Specifies the service's package related to the test case.

element.name: USE_CASE_NAME
element.documentation: Specifies the use case's name related to the test case.

element.name: USE_CASE_PACKAGE
element.documentation: Specifies the use case's package related to the test case.
